frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description: Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage
perks.name: Accelerated Coils

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
  •  Increases impact damage
  •  Slower charge time
perks.name: Liquid Coils

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.
perks.name: Rapid Hit

perks.description: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.
perks.name: Under Pressure

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage

perks.description: This weapon deals increased precision damage when near two or more allies.
perks.name: Firing Line

perks.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves.
perks.name: Clown Cartridge

perks.description: Grants reduced charge time and increased handling speed for a short time immediately after swapping to this weapon.
perks.name: Backup Plan

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Dragonfly
